title: Treating Alcohol Use Disorder
itunes:title: Treating Alcohol Use Disorder
description:
Which medications can we offer for alcohol use disorder? This episode will offer practical tips for selecting and initiating medications for managing patients with at-risk drinking and alcohol use disorder.

Guest: Joji Suzuki, M.D.
Interviewer: Wegdan Rashad, M.D.
Host: Jessica Diaz, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: What Clinicians Need to KnowAbout Alcohol Use Disorder -Interview with Joji Suzuki, M.D.
